title: Configuration Settings
description:
Create a configuration module using proper constant naming conventions.

Define these constants (use UPPERCASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES):
- Maximum number of login attempts: 3
- Session timeout in seconds: 1800
- Default language: 'en'
- API base URL: 'https://api.example.com'
- Enable debug mode: False

Then use these constants in a formatted message.
starterCode:
# Define configuration constants
# TODO: Use UPPERCASE naming for constants



# Print configuration summary
print("=== Application Configuration ===")
# TODO: Print each constant with its value
solution:
# Define configuration constants
MAX_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS = 3
SESSION_TIMEOUT_SECONDS = 1800
DEFAULT_LANGUAGE = 'en'
API_BASE_URL = 'https://api.example.com'
DEBUG_MODE = False

# Print configuration summary
print("=== Application Configuration ===")
print(f"Max Login Attempts: {MAX_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS}")
print(f"Session Timeout: {SESSION_TIMEOUT_SECONDS} seconds")
print(f"Default Language: {DEFAULT_LANGUAGE}")
print(f"API Base URL: {API_BASE_URL}")
print(f"Debug Mode: {DEBUG_MODE}")
hints: Define all constants at the top of the program
Use descriptive names: MAX_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS, not MLA
Use f-strings to print the configuration
Follow the exact output format shown
